title: The Jasmine Recipe
full_text:
The Jasmine Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
gin
3/4
ounce
fresh-squeezed lemon juice
1/4
ounce
Campari
1/4
ounce
Cointreau
Directions
Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker, fill with ice and shake well for 10 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass; garnish with a lemon twist.
Gin
